relation: Poolside at Hard Rock Hotel and Casino Las Vegas
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {2888=American punk rock band NoFX features musicians Fat Mike (lead vocals, bass guitar, keyboards), Eric Melvin (rhythm guitar, accordion, backing vocals), Erik Sandin (drums, percussion) and El Hefe ( lead guitar, trumpet, backing vocals). Since forming in Los Angeles, California in 1983, the band has taken the industry by storm. Acquiring international fame and accolades by both critics and audiences for their 1994 album, Punk in Drublic, NoFX is considered one of the most successful independent bands of all time. They have released over eleven studio albums, including Liberal Animation, Heavy Petting Zoo, and Coaster. With the pending 2012 release of their new untitled album, fans everywhere are vying for NoFX concert tickets for sneak peaks at new songs.}
